mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CENQUERY (CENQUERYSEQ, OPEN, QUERYTYPE, CUSID, CONTENT, TITLE, REGDATE) VALUES (#{cenqseq.NEXTVAL}, #{open}, #{querytype}, #{cusid}, #{content}, #{title}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE CENQUERY SET QUERYTYPE=#{querytype}, CONTENT=#{content}, TITLE=#{title}, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE CENQUERYSEQ=#{cenqNo}
